title: Emergency medicine physician impact in emergency department timeframes
text:
Emergency medicine physician impact in ED timeframes
This section includes interrupted time series and regression discontinuity models assessing the effect of having emergency physicians on critical indicators like length of stay and time-to-doctor.

title: Welcome
text:
Health Systems Analysis
Welcome to this site. Here youâ€™ll find summaries and results from ongoing research on healthcare systems in Chile.
Please explore the tabs to learn more about:

The role of Urgent Clinics (SAPU, SAR) in network-level care coordination
The impact of emergency medicine physicians on patient flow and waiting times
Estimations of hospital bed needs across Health Services

title: Bed estimation
text:
Bed Estimation
This section presents models to estimate current and future bed needs per Health Service, incorporating demographic trends and service delivery variables.

title: Urgent Clinics impact in healthcare networks
text:
Urgent Clinics impact in healthcare networks
This section includes descriptive and causal analyses on the effect of SAPU and SAR implementation on emergency department utilization.
